title: DPS BestOf
itunes:title: DPS BestOf
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show DP talks to NBA Columnist Steve Bulpett about reports that the Lakers were using their phones and texting at halftime. Frank Isola discusses the chances that we'll see Ben Simmons in the playoffs. HOF Catcher Johnny Bench weighs in on the Dodgers pulling Kershaw after 7 perfect innings. And Dominique Wilkins shares some stories from the best trash talkers when he was in the league. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
